name: dev-lifecycle-marketplace
description: Tech-agnostic workflow automation plugins for complete software development lifecycle

infrastructure._comment: Infrastructure items organized by phase for build ordering

existing.name: Plugin Framework
existing.description: Core plugin architecture with commands, agents, skills structure

existing.name: Foundation Plugin
existing.description: Project initialization, tech stack detection, environment setup, workflow generation (14 commands, 4 agents, 9 skills)

existing.name: Planning Plugin
existing.description: Specifications, architecture design, roadmaps, ADRs, feature workflow generation (16 commands, 16 agents, 6 skills)

existing.name: Implementation Plugin
existing.description: Execution orchestration, task-to-command mapping, automated feature building (5 commands, 4 agents, 1 skill)

existing.name: Iterate Plugin
existing.description: Task layering, code adjustments, refactoring, feature enhancement (5 commands, 4 agents, 2 skills)

existing.name: Quality Plugin
existing.description: Code validation, security scanning, performance analysis, compliance checking (3 commands, 5 agents, 1 skill)

existing.name: Testing Plugin
existing.description: Test execution (Newman/Postman API + Playwright E2E), test generation (3 commands, 3 agents, 5 skills)

existing.name: Deployment Plugin
existing.description: Platform auto-detection and deployment orchestration (12 commands, 9 agents, 9 skills)

existing.name: Security Plugin
existing.description: Security validation, hooks setup, vulnerability scanning (3 commands, 3 agents, 2 skills)

existing.name: Supervisor Plugin
existing.description: Worktree coordination, multi-agent tracking, completion validation (4 commands, 1 agent, 1 skill)

existing.name: Versioning Plugin
existing.description: Semantic versioning, changelog generation, release management (9 commands, 9 agents, 4 skills)

needed.name: Test Authentication System
needed.description: Test component to validate execution-orchestrator command discovery and execution

optional: AIRTABLE_BASE_ID - For stack and command registry

workflows: Plugin Validation - Validates all plugin.json files
Command Length Check - Ensures commands under 172 lines
Agent Length Check - Ensures agents under 300 lines
Git Commit Format - Validates conventional commit messages
